QuestData.Title: The Offering to Azshara
QuestData.Description: The warlord said the horn of the ancients was being offered to Azshara above Nazj'vel.$B$BPerhaps it's not too late to save the ancient relic from being destroyed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Stop the Darkscale Priestesses from offering the Horn of the Ancients to Azshara above Nazj'vel.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done well, $n. Unfortunately the battle is far from over.
